title: The Jewish Art of Self Discovery
description: Self-knowledge is a necessary skill to master. It allows us to access our inner resources, recognize and shape the lens through which we see the world, and navigate a course to actualize our highest potential. The Jewish Art of Self Discovery is a guidebook for entering the gates of this wisdom of self-discovery. This work uses the timeless insights into human nature contained in Torah literature as its compass. Through the use of concise essays, stories, and reflective questions, the Self-explorer is escorted along their path. Read this book, reflect on its contents, and reach for your greatest self.
author: Benjamin Rapaport
